documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Create, edit and manage your documents with powerful collaboration features. Seamlessly integrate with Dropbox for secure storage and sharing.

diagrams.title: UML Diagrams
diagrams.description: Design and visualize system architectures with our intuitive UML diagram creator. Create flowcharts, sequence diagrams, and more.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Track trends and analyze tech stacks with comprehensive data visualization tools. Get insights from your business data.

audio.title: Audio Studio
audio.description: Create and edit audio with modular synthesizers and professional mixing tools. Record, edit, and export high-quality audio.

invoicing.title: Invoicing
invoicing.description: Generate, manage and track invoices with our complete business toolkit. Automate your billing process and financial reporting.
